api.signuporsignin.api.signuporsignin.UxElement.heading: Sign in
api.signuporsignin.api.signuporsignin.UxElement.unknown_err: We are having trouble signing you in. Please try again later.
api.signuporsignin.api.signuporsignin.ErrorMessage.UserMess: We can't seem to find your account.
Looks like you used an old password.

  - an uppercase letter
  - a number
  - a symbol
